isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - INTERNATIONAL 530E I6 HEUI ENGINES - OPERATION - Vehicle Speed Sensor (VSS)

svcproc.title: Vehicle Speed Sensor (VSS)
svcproc.para: The Vehicle Speed Sensor (VSS) provides vehicle speed and engine RPM signals to the CEC. This information is also used by the CEC to control the Cruise/PTO system.
Two types of sensors are available. The threaded (adjustable) sensor is used on most transmissions. A new push-in style sensor (nonadjustable) is used on some transmissions.
